data.name: The Proponent
data.detailed_description:
"What did the City give you? Streets to walk on, a place to sleep and to work. A place to live. It’s beautiful... fine... but what’s the price? No, really, answer me: what can you give the City? Take your time, think about it. Maybe this will allow you to survive."



Hello everyone. I invite you to play The Proponent - a first-person horror that focuses on the atmosphere and the presentation of the story through the details. I tried to avoid the extreme, when the narrative is presented only through notes and audio files, although I decided not to leave the game without them, sometimes it is a really good way to tell a part of the story.


Both the setting and the environment in the game are based on my dreams and dreams of people close and familiar to me, so there is a lot of personal in what is happening. There’s a bit of history here, but I wanted to leave some place for observation, not to explain some things, because they’re a mystery to me right now, and yet I’d like to share that experience with you.

To a large extent, this game is a kind of interactive narrative in which we assume that the City has its own separate essence and interests. That, besides us and other creatures familiar to our eyes, the City can be inhabited by other creatures, of which we know little. Is what is happening a dream or a hassle, is it real, or is it something between sleep and reality? You can try to figure it out by playing.

By exploring the surroundings, you’ll be able to understand more about the hero, about where he’s going, about the creatures that inhabit this place. But the world is not safe, and you will have no way of openly confronting hostile creatures in the usual ways, so you must consider how to do it differently. Sometimes it’s better to avoid something dangerous and obscure.

data.short_description: What if the city is a living being with its own essence? The Proponent is a first-person horror where you take on the role of a man trapped in a high-rise building and try to find a way out.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20GHz 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: radeon rx550/550 series 4 гб

content_descriptors.notes: Violent and violent scenes, adult content
